info.name: Full Regression Test Suite
info.description: A collection of tests that hit all the V3 API endpoints to ensure the API is functioning properly. The requests are split into 4 folders: Types, Customers, Targets, and Switches. The tests must be run in the order displayed here to function properly. Currently there are **93** requests and **507** tests in this collection.

item.name: Types
item.description: Folder containing the tests for the GET `/types/targets`, `/types/switch/statuses`, and `/types/switch/actions` routes.

exec: pm.test('Has the correct kind attribute', function() {
"help": "Instructions to a company/govt. agency to change future direct deposits to your account."
//TODO: Add this test back in once we enable account closures again.
//     "help": "Instructions to a company to close an account that you no longer need."
"help": "Instructions to a company/govt. agency to change future automatic payments from your account."

request.description: Asserts that the GET `/types/targets` endpoint is returning the correct values.

exec: pm.test('Has the correct kind attribute', function() {
"help": "The switch is ready to submit for processing."
"help": "The switch is missing information required for processing."
"help": "The switch has been submitted for processing."
"help": "The switch has been printed for signature and/or in-person delivery."
"help": "The switch is currently being processed by our fulfillment team."
"help": "The switch has been sent to the company or govt. agency for action."
"help": "The company or govt. agency has acknowledged that the change has been completed."
"help": "The switch is unable to be processed."

request.description: Asserts that the GET `/types/switch/statuses` endpoint is returning the correct values.

exec: pm.test('Has the correct kind attribute', function() {
"help": "You've taken the steps to make this change online or in person, so mark it complete."
"help": "Print the switch to sign or deliver in person."
"help": "Returns a canceled switch back to a state where it can be edited."
"help": "Deletes a switch that has been canceled."

request.description: Asserts that the GET `/types/switch/actions` endpoint is returning the correct values.

item.name: Customers
item.description: Folder containing the tests for the PUT `/customers/{customerKey}` and GET `/customers/{customerKey}` routes.

item.name: Switches
item.description: Folder containing the tests for the GET `/customers/{customerKey}/switches`, POST `/customers/{customerKey}/switches`, GET `/customers/{customerKey}/switches/{switchIndex}`, PUT `/customers/{customerKey}/switches/{switchIndex}`, DELETE `/customers/{customerKey}/switches/{switchIndex}`, and POST `/customers/{customerKey}/switches/{switchIndex}/action` routes.
